title: Here begynneth a lytle boke named the Schole house of women wherin euery man may rede a goodly prayse of the condicyons of women.
author: Gosynhyll, Edward, attributed name.
publicationStmtDate: The yeare of our Lorde: M.D.XLj. [1541]
publicationStmtPublisher: In Paules Churche yearde, at the sygne of the maydens heed, by Thomas Petyt],
